Module crcCards

Class Instructor

java.lang.Object
Instructor
public class Instructor extends Object
The Instructor class hold the basic information of an Instructor : instructorName, instructorID, listofAssignedClasses This class has method to assign grades to students, create a schedule of all assigned classes.
